thread.title: Part-Time Facility Operations Supervisor - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Part-Time Facility Operations Supervisor - Sports Management

title: Part-Time Facility Operations Supervisor - Sports Management
text: We aer looking for a part-time Facility Operations Supervisor to assist with its daily schedule through early spring.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
